name: Soul Society：Defense War
description:
Players will enter the world of Bleach as its characters and have the real battle experience and the best plot reproduction. You can find combinations that suit your style and match your own lineups! No more waiting! Join us now to conquer the world!

Plot Reproduction
Relive the plot of the original anime to experience the very lives of its characters.

New Gameplays
Team up with players of the same faction to fight against other factions! Enjoy the upgraded experience in cross-server battles and teamwork!

Generous Autoplay Earnings
Autoplay grants abundant resources, boosting your growth and progress even if you're offline!

Strategic Cooperation
Upgrade popular characters and build different lineups to win every battle in the Arena!
